item.title: Carbontribe Labs, developer of a carbon credit generation AI tool, awarded the Decarbonization Division Prize at the Ichibiz Awards hosted by the Japan's Cabinet Office
item.description:
https://prtimes.jp/main/html/rd/p/000000001.000132024.html

Thrilled to announce that Carbontribe clinched the Decarbonization Award at the “IchiBiz Award,” a business contest organized by the Cabinet Office of JapanüáØüáµ, harnessing geospatial information. üèÜüå± Our commitment to carbon neutrality is gaining recognition! hashtag#Carbontribe hashtag#IchiBizAward hashtag#DecarbonizationLeadership
